trans-unit.source: Defines the methods called during contract generation that can be used to modify the generated code for a service contract.
trans-unit.target: 定义协定生成期间调用的方法，这些方法可用于修改为服务协定生成的代码。

trans-unit.source: Implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> interface on a contract behavior (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> type) to enable you to modify the code generated when a contract or endpoint is compiled into code.
trans-unit.target: 对协定行为（<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> 类型）实现 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior?displayProperty=nameWithType> 接口可以使您能够修改协定或终结点编译为代码时生成的代码。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> inserts a custom contract behavior into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 通常，在调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=nameWithType> 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 期间，自定义 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A> 会向 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportEndpoint%2A> 集合中插入自定义协定行为。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何在调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> 期间向 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性添加 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code examples show the implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> that adds comments to the code generated for a service contract.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了向为服务协定生成的代码中添加注释的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> 的实现。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the generated comments on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了对服务协定生成的注释。

trans-unit.source: The code generated context to use to modify the code document prior to generation.
trans-unit.target: 代码生成要使用的上下文，以在生成之前修改代码文档。

trans-unit.source: Implement to modify the code document object model prior to the contract generation process.
trans-unit.target: 实现此方法可以在开始协定生成过程之前修改代码文档对象模型。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> to modify the contract, operations, or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> prior to code generation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=nameWithType> 在代码生成之前修改协定、操作或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to add an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property during the call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了如何在调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension> 期间向 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 属性添加 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension.ImportContract%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code examples show the implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> that adds comments to the code generated for a service contract.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了向为服务协定生成的代码中添加注释的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A> 的实现。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the generated comments on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了对服务协定生成的注释。
